name: Evil Mutant Gummy Bears
description:
A mad scientist with good intentions has messed up and has accidentally created an army of evil mutant gummy bears, hell bent on taking over the world. You find yourself dropped right in the middle of the unfolding disaster, can you stop it or will we be replaced on the evolutionary food chain.

This is an early prototype a new FPS game I'm currently working on. I'm aiming to bring out a new version every couple of weeks. Please have a look and leave comment below.

Controls

  • Mouse to look
  • Arrows or wasd to move
  • Space to jump
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click to use scope
  • Number keys to change weapons, 1:Handgun, 3:Riffle, 8: Grenade (more weapons to follow)
  • "F" for civilians to follow you or stop
